item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I am pspiagicw (call me psp). For communicating with me here is my public PGP key.
dotback dotback backs up your dotfiles. Instead of making confusing and outright dangerous symlinks, this simply backs up your dotfiles using a toml file.

qemantra qemantra is a tool to manage QEMU/KVM virtual machines. qemantra Features Dependencies Installation Config Usage create run list rename edit UEFI Similar Projects Contribution Features Use QEMU without a graphical interface.
sinister sinister is a tool to sync and download videos from Youtube. config To start using sinister, you need to create a config file at /home/<username>/.
